page.title: 03Dalton Fun Run - by Debbie
page.content: At 11.00 on Sunday 16th June we went to Dalton village hall for the annual fun run.We ran from{Dalton}to the{A66} and along it to the{A66 Motel}then turned towards{Newsham,}on to {Barningham}and then up on to the moors. There were a number of men at points around the course acting as marshals to make sure that everybody went the right way. The course over the moors is hilly and about 4 miles out of the total 10 miles.{Josie's mum}gave us some water as we passed over the moor to{Silver {Hill}and back down to Newsham. I walked a mile before reaching Newsham and finished by racing the girl who was with me,back into Dalton -she won. I came 2nd,{Jane Herring}and{Jayne {Parker}came joint 3rd,a stranger came 1st. My time was 1h 46m 6s.{Mr Metcalf presented the trophies.
